::Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Reptilica shruggs. "Beats me," he says, looking down at his 
scanners, "But we're being lowered."

He looks at Desmonus' rear as she does, his eyes sliding up her body, 
Bloodystrike's doing the same on the other side of her.

"Uh.." Bloodystrike replies to her question, "Spiked energon can be 
good..."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Desmonus shook out her wing as Bloodystrike got off of it, 
noticing it's 
> sore joints as she saw him reach out a hand to help her up.
> She's just about to take it when suddenly the base rocks, luckely 
she was 
> still on the ground. But she braces herself.
> 
> But then at Reptilicas report that they were merged again she 
slowly gets to 
> her feet, hanging onto the wall for support just in case the base 
decided to 
> shake again.
> Though, Desmonus turnes her amber optics towards Reptilica.*
> 
> " But why did we have to relocate in the first place. I thought 
that we had 
> already chosen our landing spot the last time we set down?"
> 
> * Desmonus steps away from the wall a bit, but keeping a bit close 
to it 
> just to make sure she had something to support her if something 
else 
> happened.
> She began to dust off her armor and her wings, looking behind to 
make sure 
> there weren't any smudges on her rear.
> Nothing.
> Desmonus looked towards Bloodystrike as he turned his gaze towards 
her.
> But glad that at least it was the drink he was after at the moment.*
> 
> " Sounds good to me. Hmm...what would you recommend?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
